flawed_nl_solution:
5 hours in the studio is the same as 5 * 60 = <<5*60=300>>300 minutes.
To record all of his songs, Elvis takes 12 * 10 = <<12*10=210>>210 minutes.
After editing and recording 300 - 210 - 30 = <<300-210-30=60>>60 minutes are left to write all of his songs.
Songwriting therefore took 60 / 10 = <<60/10=6>>6 minutes per song.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
